member.summary: The bucket containing the object.

member.summary: The key of the object to crawl.

member.summary: The secret key to use while crawling.

member.name: M:Komodo.Crawler.S3Crawler.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,BlobHelper.AwsRegion)
member.summary: Instantiate the object to crawl on AWS S3.

member.name: M:Komodo.Crawler.S3Crawler.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,BlobHelper.AwsRegion,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate the object to crawl on S3-compatible storage.
member.param: Endpoint for the S3-compatible storage, of the form http://[hostname]:[port]/.

Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.
